alert.note: Alert for North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Arapahoe, central Denver and southwestern Adams Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Commerce City, or 8 miles northeast of Denver, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Denver, Aurora, southern Thornton, Commerce City, Brighton, southwestern Denver International Airport, Watkins and Buckley AFB. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
